question_text: What is the main limitation of USB-based port replicators compared to dedicated docking stations?
answer_options: They have limited bandwidth for high-performance applications
They only work with specific laptop models
correct_answer: They have limited bandwidth for high-performance applications
explanation: USB-based port replicators are limited by USB bandwidth, which may not support multiple high-resolution displays or high-performance peripherals as effectively as dedicated docking stations.
